Recipes Views¶

class recipes.views.RecipeDetailView(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: LoginRequiredMixin, DetailView

Class-based view for displaying details of a recipe.

Attributes: - model: Recipe model. - template_name: HTML template for rendering the view.

template_name = 'recipes/recipe_detail.html'¶
class recipes.views.RecipeListView(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: LoginRequiredMixin, ListView

Class-based view for displaying a list of recipes.

Attributes: - model: Recipe model. - template_name: HTML template for rendering the view. - context_object_name: Name of the context variable containing the list of recipes. - paginate_by: Number of recipes to display per page.

context_object_name = 'object_list'¶
get(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶
get_queryset()¶
login_url = '/login/'¶
paginate_by = 10¶
template_name = 'recipes/recipe_list.html'¶
class recipes.views.RecipeListViewAll(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: LoginRequiredMixin, ListView

Class-based view for displaying a list of all recipes.

Attributes: - model: Recipe model. - template_name: HTML template for rendering the view. - context_object_name: Name of the context variable containing the list of all recipes. - paginate_by: Number of recipes to display per page.

context_object_name = 'object_list_all'¶
get_queryset()¶
paginate_by = 10¶
template_name = 'recipes/recipe_list.html'¶
recipes.views.about_me(request)¶

View for displaying information about the author.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object.

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the about me page.

recipes.views.create_recipe(request)¶

View for creating a new recipe.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object.

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the create recipe page.

recipes.views.credits2(request)¶

View for displaying credits information.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object.

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the credits page.

recipes.views.recipe_difficulty_distribution(request, type_of_recipe=None)¶

View for displaying a chart of recipe difficulty distribution.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object. - type_of_recipe: Type of recipe to filter data (optional).

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the recipe difficulty distribution chart.

recipes.views.recipe_type_distribution(request, type_of_recipe=None)¶

View for displaying a chart of recipe type distribution.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object. - type_of_recipe: Type of recipe to filter data (optional).

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the recipe type distribution chart.

recipes.views.recipes_created_per_month(request)¶

View for displaying a chart of recipes created per month.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object.

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the recipes created per month chart.

recipes.views.recipes_home(request)¶

View for the home page displaying a list of recipes with infinite scrolling.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object.

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the home page.

recipes.views.search_view(request)¶

View for searching recipes.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object.

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the search results.

recipes.views.visualizations(request, type_of_recipe=None)¶

View for displaying visualizations of recipe data.

Parameters: - request: Django HTTP request object. - type_of_recipe: Type of recipe to filter data (optional).

Returns: - Rendered HTML response for the visualizations page.
